plugin-data.name: TinyMCEfileman
plugin-data.description: HTML editor for formatting content with built-in file manager

Toolbar top default: Default value: formatselect bold italic forecolor backcolor removeformat | bullist numlist table | blockquote alignleft aligncenter alignright | link unlink pagebreak image code responsivefilemanager
Plugins default: Default value: code autolink image link pagebreak advlist lists textpattern table responsivefilemanager
Filemanager Access Key: Filemanager Access Key (need if you enabled USE_ACCESS_KEYS in filemanager config).
